table.label: requestVarGroup
table.title: 3.1 Request variable group: a collection of request variables
table.description: A group of request variables, or a table, which can be referred to from a request link.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: Endorsed MIP defining the variable group
rowAttribute.description: Link to the MIP which specified this collection of variables. The collection may be re-used by other MIPs through the requestLink records.

rowAttribute.label: ref
rowAttribute.title: Reference
rowAttribute.description: Information about the origins of this group

rowAttribute.label: refNote
rowAttribute.title: Reference Note
rowAttribute.description: Further information about the origins of this group.

table.label: requestItem
table.title: 3.2 Request Item: specifying the number of years for an experiment
table.description: The request item links a collection of variables with a specific experiment or group of experiments, and a temporal range for output. The 'esid' attribute links to an experiment, and experiment group or a MIP. In the latter case, the request applies to all experiments defined by that MIP.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: The MIP making the request.
rowAttribute.description: Model Intecomparison Project associated with the requestItem. Redundant because this is specified through the requestLink.

rowAttribute.label: tab
rowAttribute.title: Redundant?
rowAttribute.description: Redundant attribute ...

rowAttribute.label: expt
rowAttribute.title: Name of experiment or group of experiments
rowAttribute.description: This is redundant: the information is provided through the esid link.

rowAttribute.label: rlid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier of Corresponding Request Link
rowAttribute.description: Link to a requestLink record, which makes the connection to a variableGroup and a set of objectives.

rowAttribute.label: esid
rowAttribute.title: A link to an experiment, an experiment group or a MIP
rowAttribute.description: This links to an individual experiment, to an experimentGroup, specifying a collection of experiments, or to a MIP. If it links to a MIP it means that the request applies to all experiments defined by that MIP.

rowAttribute.label: esidComment
rowAttribute.title: Comment on experiment(s) linked to.
rowAttribute.description: An explanatory commemt for the esid attribute.

rowAttribute.label: preset
rowAttribute.title: Option to override priority set in each variable group
rowAttribute.description: If, for example, preset is set to 2, all priority one variables in the variable group associated with this request are treated as priority 2 variables.

rowAttribute.label: treset
rowAttribute.title: Option to override tier set for experiment(s)
rowAttribute.description: If, for example, treset is set to 1, all tier 2 and 3 experiments associated with this request are treated as tier 1 variables.

rowAttribute.label: ny
rowAttribute.title: Default number of years.
rowAttribute.description: Default number of years, only used if experiment specifications are incomplete: will be redundant in final request.

rowAttribute.label: nexmax
rowAttribute.title: Maximum number of experiments requested.
rowAttribute.description: Used to provide volume estimate before the links to experiment groups was fully functional.

rowAttribute.label: nenmax
rowAttribute.title: Number of ensemble members requested.
rowAttribute.description: If set to -1 then the request applies to to all the ensemble members specified in the ensz attribute of the experiment or experiments associated with the request. Note that ensz is a default ensemble size, and nenmax may be greater if one MIP wants more than the default number of ensembles.

rowAttribute.label: nymax
rowAttribute.title: Number of years requested.
rowAttribute.description: Number of years specified by the requesting MIP (will be redundant when links to temporal slices are fully implemented).

rowAttribute.label: tslice
rowAttribute.title: Selection of years from experiment
rowAttribute.description: Optional link to a time slice specifier which will define subset of the years from an experiment.

table.label: exptgroup
table.title: 1.9 Experiment Group
table.description: The experiment group defines a collection of experiments within a MIP which might be part of a collective data request.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: tierMin
rowAttribute.title: Minimum tier of experiments in group
rowAttribute.description: Minimum tier of experiments associated with this group.

rowAttribute.label: ntot
rowAttribute.title: Total number of years
rowAttribute.description: Total number of simulation years associated with experiments in this group.

table.label: miptable
table.title: 2.4 MIP tables
table.description: The MIP tables are used to organise the variables. Each variable in a MIP table must have a unique output name (defined by the label of the {var} record associated with each {CMORvar} record). The structure of the MIP tables has evolved as the request has expanded from CMIP3 through CMIP5 to CMIP6. The naming convention for the CMIP6 tables is described on the WIP [https://earthsystemcog.org/projects/wip/mip_table_about MIP Tables in the CMIP6 Data Request] page.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: frequency
rowAttribute.title: Frequency
rowAttribute.description: Frequency of data variables defined in this table. Note that this has not been updated to reflect changes in the definition of the CMIP frequency controlled attribute. There are now multiple frequency values in each table.

rowAttribute.label: altLabel
rowAttribute.title: Alternative Label
rowAttribute.description: Depricated: holds old form of the table label. Used for tracking changes.

rowAttribute.label: comment
rowAttribute.title: Comment
rowAttribute.description: Comment about the table.

table.label: CMORvar
table.title: 1.3 CMOR Variable
table.description: Each Output variable record corresponds to a MIP table variable specification. In a change from the August draft, this record does not contain the 'priority' attribute: the priority is now set in the 'Request Variable' record. The other change is that a collection of attributes specifying dimensions etc have been moved into the 'structure' record, and each CMOR Variable record links to one structure record. This will fa-cilitate provision of clear and consistent definitions of output formats.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: CMOR Variable Name
rowAttribute.description: When there are multiple options for a variable within one CMOR table, each option must be given a unique CMOR name in this attribute. If there is only one option, the CMOR name should equal the value of the label in the MIP variable record referred to by the vid attribute.

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Long name
rowAttribute.description: The long name is used as the long_name variable attribute in the NetCDF files.

rowAttribute.label: stid
rowAttribute.title: Link to a record specifying the structure of the variable
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record describing the structure of the variable (e.g. spatial and temporal dimensions).

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: MIP Variable
rowAttribute.description: The MIP Variable specifies the physical quantity.

rowAttribute.label: deflate
rowAttribute.title: Deflate: NetCDF compression parameter
rowAttribute.description: Obsolete, not used in CMIP6.

rowAttribute.label: deflate_level
rowAttribute.title: Deflate Level: NetCDF compression parameter
rowAttribute.description: Obsolete, not used in CMIP6.

rowAttribute.label: shuffle
rowAttribute.title: Shuffle: NetCDF compression parameter
rowAttribute.description: Obsolete, not used in CMIP6.

rowAttribute.label: defaultPriority
rowAttribute.title: Indicative priority for this parameter, which is over-ruled by the requestVar priority setting, but provides a reference for organisation of the CMORvariables
rowAttribute.description: For the priority of requested data, the priority attribute of the requestVar section should be used.

rowAttribute.label: type
rowAttribute.title: Data value type, e.g. float or double
rowAttribute.description: Data type is specified using Fortran code words: character, double, integer, real

rowAttribute.label: modeling_realm
rowAttribute.title: Modeling Realm
rowAttribute.description: A string that indicates the high level modeling component which is particularly relevant. Note that sometimes a variable will be equally (or almost equally relevant) to two or more realms, in which case a primary realm is assigned as the first listed and other relevant realms follow in a space separated list.
rowAttribute.usage: Useful for sifting variables. There is some ambiguity around the boundaries.

rowAttribute.label: positive
rowAttribute.title: CMOR Directive Positive
rowAttribute.description: For any variable where the DREQ has specified a value for 'positive', CMOR requires users to say whether the data they're giving CMOR assumes 'positive is up' or 'positive is down'. If the user's direction is opposite what is requested by DREQ, CMOR multiplies the data by -1 before storing it, so that it will conform with the specifications.

rowAttribute.label: mipTableSection
rowAttribute.title: Section of a table
rowAttribute.description: Some MIP tables are divided into subsections containing different categories of variables.

rowAttribute.label: mtid
rowAttribute.title: Link to MIP table record
rowAttribute.description: A link to the record for the MIP table identified by the mipTable attribute.

rowAttribute.label: mipTable
rowAttribute.title: The MIP table
rowAttribute.description: Each table identifies a collection of variables with a common frequency.

rowAttribute.label: prov
rowAttribute.title: Provenance
rowAttribute.description: Provides some indication of the origins of the parameter definition (e.g. the MIP responsible for first defining the variable). Once defined, a variable may be requested by multiple MIPs.

rowAttribute.label: processing
rowAttribute.title: Processing Notes
rowAttribute.description: Processing notes (questions and issues)

rowAttribute.label: provNote
rowAttribute.title: Provenance Note
rowAttribute.description: Additional information on provenance, intended to be machine interpretable.

rowAttribute.label: frequency
rowAttribute.title: Frequency of Time Steps to be Archived
rowAttribute.description: See https://earthsystemcog.org/projects/wip/time_of_day for details of time of day for sub-hourly frequencies.

rowAttribute.label: rowIndex
rowAttribute.title: Row index of entry in source sheet
rowAttribute.description: Information about source of information.

rowAttribute.label: subGroup
rowAttribute.title: Sub-group of variables in a table
rowAttribute.description: Identify a sub-group, for ease of processing. A sub-group can be copied to a request variable group.

table.label: objective
table.title: 1.6 Scientific objectives
table.description: The objectives defined by each MIP can be used to select data requirements.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: Endorsed MIP
rowAttribute.description: Link to Model Intercomparison Project with this objective.

table.label: spatialShape
table.title: 2.1 Spatial dimensions
table.description: The spatial shape record contains the spatial dimensions of the field, and also, for convenience, an integer specifying the number of levels if that number is specified. A boolean level flag is set to 'true' if the number of vertical levels is specified.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: A string of the form 'hh-vv' where 'hh' and 'vv' are short mnemonics for the horizontal and vertical structure respectively, each set to 'na', for 'not applicable', if there are no relevant dimensions.

rowAttribute.label: dimensions
rowAttribute.title: List of spatial dimensions
rowAttribute.description: List of the labels of dimension attributes (redundant with dimids).

rowAttribute.label: dimids
rowAttribute.title: Identifiers for records in grids section
rowAttribute.description: List of links to dimensions specified by records in the grids section.

rowAttribute.label: levels
rowAttribute.title: Number of vertical levels (ignored if levelFlag=false)
rowAttribute.description: The number of vertical levels, if fixed.

rowAttribute.label: levelFlag
rowAttribute.title: Flag set to *false* if number of levels is optional (e.g. determined by the model)
rowAttribute.description: True is there is a fixed number of levels specified by the 'levels' attribute.

table.label: requestLink
table.title: 3.3 Request link: linking a set of variables and a set of experiments
table.description: The request link records specify some additional information about variable groups, concerning shared output requirements and objectives.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: Endorsed MIP requesting the data
rowAttribute.description: Link to record defining the MIP using this record.

rowAttribute.label: tab
rowAttribute.title: Redundant
rowAttribute.description: A redundant attribute.

rowAttribute.label: objective
rowAttribute.title: Science objectives associated with this request
rowAttribute.description: Every request for model ouput is linked to one or more objectives. The XML link is made via objectiveLink records, each of which associates one requestLink with one objective record.

rowAttribute.label: grid
rowAttribute.title: Grid options
rowAttribute.description: Specified required or preferred (depending on the value of gridreq) horizontal grid. Options: native (for model grid), 1deg, 2deg, 8 to 25km (8km preferred, less than 25km required), 5 to 25km (5km preferred, less than 25km required), blank (no prerefence).

rowAttribute.label: gridreq
rowAttribute.title: Grid option constraints
rowAttribute.description: Is the grid specified by the grid attribute optional (yes) or (no), conditionally (no*1 -- used for ocean data, when native is required only from models using a regular grid)

rowAttribute.label: comment
rowAttribute.title: Comment
rowAttribute.description: Comment on the requestLink record.

rowAttribute.label: ref
rowAttribute.title: Reference
rowAttribute.description: Not used.

rowAttribute.label: refNote
rowAttribute.title: Note on reference
rowAttribute.description: A comment on the provenance of the record.

rowAttribute.label: refid
rowAttribute.title: Reference to a request Variable Group
rowAttribute.description: Link to the requestVarGroup record defining the variables associated with this requestLink.

rowAttribute.label: opt
rowAttribute.title: Option for selecting a subset of variables
rowAttribute.description: Option for specifying that only a subset of the variables specified in the requestVarGroup should be used. This option is designed to enable the re-use of groups when an easily identified subset of an existing group is wanted. Forreen completed at the request compilation stage. If 'prioirty' is specified, then only variables with priority less than the value specified by 'opar' should be used.

rowAttribute.label: opar
rowAttribute.title: parameter associated with *opt*
rowAttribute.description: Parameter associated with 'opar'. If 'opar' is 'priority' it should be set to '1', '2', or '3'.

table.label: tableSection
table.title: 3.4 CMOR Table Sections
table.description: Section of a MIP tables

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: gpid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for CMOR Tables
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record defining a CMOR table.

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: Project
rowAttribute.description: Redundant. Specification of a MIP.

rowAttribute.label: ref
rowAttribute.title: Reference
rowAttribute.description: Comment on provenance.

rowAttribute.label: refNote
rowAttribute.title: Note on reference
rowAttribute.description: Further information on provenance.

table.label: modelConfig
table.title: 3.5 Model configuration options
table.description: Configuration options for models

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: MIPs
rowAttribute.title: MIPs which make use of this feature
rowAttribute.description: List of MIPs using this option.

rowAttribute.label: usage
rowAttribute.title: How the feature is relevant to the data request
rowAttribute.description: Usage notes.

rowAttribute.label: type
rowAttribute.title: Type of model
rowAttribute.description: A categorisation of model configuration options: capability (indicating whether a model has a specific capability); size (indicating a size, such as number of grid points); category (inidcating a type of model); ioOption (indicating a choice taken regarding IO).

rowAttribute.label: range
rowAttribute.title: Range of valid values, e.g. xs:boolean
rowAttribute.description: Specification of the value type, e.g. 'xs:boolean'.

table.label: varChoiceLinkC
table.title: 3.6 Links a variable to a choice element
table.description: Link between a variable choice element and variables

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: Variable
rowAttribute.description: Link to a variable which should be treated as requested if the configuration option is appropriately set.

rowAttribute.label: cfgid
rowAttribute.title: Configuration Option
rowAttribute.description: A link to a record defining a model configuration options. Configuration options should be defined so that they are either True of False when a model is configured for execution. E.g. does the model have a Boussinesq ocean?

rowAttribute.label: cfg
rowAttribute.title: Configuration Value
rowAttribute.description: Gives the configuration option value for which the variable linked from thos record should be used.

rowAttribute.label: cid
rowAttribute.title: Choice -- can provide a link to related variables
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record which identifies the collection of related variables associated with this configuration option.

table.label: objectiveLink
table.title: 3.7 Link between scientific objectives and requests
table.description: Each objective link record joins one objective to one request link. Some requests are linked to multiple objectives and most objectives are linked to multiple requests.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: oid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for a scientific objective
rowAttribute.description: Link to record defining an objective.

rowAttribute.label: rid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for a request link
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record defining a requestLink.

table.label: remarks
table.title: 3.8 Remarks about other items
table.description: The remarks section contains additional comments about other records. It can be used to add detail without adding to the complexity of the other sections.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: tid
rowAttribute.title: Target identifier: the record ID of the item this refers to.
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record which this remark relates to.

rowAttribute.label: tattr
rowAttribute.title: Target attribute: an attribute of the target item, or 'ALL'
rowAttribute.description: This attribute may be used to identify a specific attribute on the record identified by tid.

rowAttribute.label: description
rowAttribute.title: Free text remarks -- unless there are specific restrictions associated with the class attribute of this remark

rowAttribute.label: class
rowAttribute.title: Class categorisation of remarks
rowAttribute.description: Different classes of remark support a range of specialised usages: free (a free text comment), modelTypeReq (a model type requirement), modelTypeExcl (a model type exclusion), varAlt (an alternative variable that my be used instead of this one), varSup (an alternative variable which, if selected makes this one redundant), attChange (a change in the value of an attribute -- old value provided in 'techNote').

rowAttribute.label: qid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier linking to a related record.
rowAttribute.description: Identifier required for classes modelTypeReq, modelTypeExcl, varAlt, varSup. For the first two classes, the identifier points to a model type specification, for the last two it points to an output variable specification.

rowAttribute.label: techNote
rowAttribute.title: Optional additional machine readable content (though not restricted by the schema)
rowAttribute.description: Intended for machine readable content.

rowAttribute.label: prov
rowAttribute.title: Provenance
rowAttribute.description: Information about the provenance of this record.

table.label: experiment
table.title: 1.5 Experiments
table.description: The experiment record contains the key information from the 'Experiment' sheet of the request template, including the tier of the experiment, the duration and start and end dates.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: egid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for experiment group
rowAttribute.description: Link to the exptgroup record associated with this experiment. Each experiment belongs to one experiment group.

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: MIP defining experiment
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record defining the primary Model Intercomparison Project responsible for the definition of this experiment.

rowAttribute.label: mcfg
rowAttribute.title: Model Source Types
rowAttribute.description: Specifies the model source types which are required/allowed for this experiment (see https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP6_Cvs/blob/master/CMIP6_source_type.json). Syntax is a space separated list of required source types, follwed by a | and a space separated list of additional allowed source types.

rowAttribute.label: tier
rowAttribute.title: Tier of Experiment
rowAttribute.description: Experiments are assigned a tier by the MIP specifying the tier, tier 1 experiments being the most important.
rowAttribute.usage: Must be a list of the same length as ensz.

rowAttribute.label: nstart
rowAttribute.title: Number of Start Dates
rowAttribute.description: For experiments with multiple start times, this gives the number of start times requested. Set to '1' otherwise.

rowAttribute.label: starty
rowAttribute.title: Start year
rowAttribute.description: Start year specified for the experiment. This is a string. Fit may contain a year or an explanation which makes reference to another experiment, e.g. 'Year 111 of abrupt4xCO2'.

rowAttribute.label: endy
rowAttribute.title: End year
rowAttribute.description: End year specified for the experiment. This is a string. Fit may contain a year or an explanation which makes reference to another experiment, e.g. 'Year 140 of abrupt4xCO2'.

rowAttribute.label: yps
rowAttribute.title: Years per Simulation Including all Start Years
rowAttribute.description: The number of years per simulation, including all start years. Equal to ES-DOC min_number_yrs_per_sim times nstart.

rowAttribute.label: ensz
rowAttribute.title: Ensemble size
rowAttribute.description: Default ensemble size, excluding multiple start times. Total number of model executions will be nstart time ensz. Note that some MIPs may request data from more than the default ensemble size.

rowAttribute.label: ntot
rowAttribute.title: Total number of years
rowAttribute.description: Depricated. Initially used as an estimate of number of years.

rowAttribute.label: comment
rowAttribute.title: Comment
rowAttribute.description: Additional information about this experiment group.

table.label: requestVar
table.title: 1.4 Request variable (carrying priority and link to group)
table.description: The request variable is now a short record which combines a CMOR variable with a priority and assigns it to a request group.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: priority
rowAttribute.title: Variable priority
rowAttribute.description: The priority of the variable (1: high, 2: medium or 3: low). An indication of the importance of the variable for the science team requesting it.

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for MIP Output Variable
rowAttribute.description: Link to a CMORvar record.

rowAttribute.label: vgid
rowAttribute.title: Identifier for Variable Group
rowAttribute.description: Link to a requestVarGroup record.

rowAttribute.label: mip
rowAttribute.title: Endorsed MIP
rowAttribute.description: Name of the Model Intercomparison Project requesting this variable.

table.label: standardname
table.title: 1.8 CF Standard Names
table.description: CF Standard Names (copied into data request to facilitate validation, particularly validation of consistency of definition in the CF standard with usage in the data request).

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: units
rowAttribute.title: Canonical Units
rowAttribute.description: The canonical units provide reference unit of measure. Any variable using the standard name should us units which conform with the canonical units. For example, if the canonical units are 'm' (metres) then 'km' (kilometres) would be valid variable units.

table.label: varChoiceLinkR
table.title: 3.9 Links a variable to a choice element
table.description: Link between a variable choice element and variables

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: Variable
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record defining a variable.

rowAttribute.label: cid
rowAttribute.title: Choice
rowAttribute.description: Link to a record identifying a choice group.

rowAttribute.label: rank
rowAttribute.title: For ranked choices, the rank of this variable (higher rank makes lower ranks redundant)
rowAttribute.description: Integer specifying the rank of the variable identified by vid. If multiple variables in the the choice group are requested, only the highest ranking variable needs to be provided.

table.label: var
table.title: 1.2 MIP Variable
table.description: Each MIP variable record defines a MIP variable name, associated with a CF Standard Name.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Variable Name
rowAttribute.usage: A short name for the variable, consistent, where possible, with names of related variables.

rowAttribute.label: sn
rowAttribute.title: CF Standard Name
rowAttribute.description: The CF Standard Name is part of an extensive vocabulary maintained within the CF Convention.
rowAttribute.usage: The CF Standard Name must be approved and published in the CF Convention

rowAttribute.label: units
rowAttribute.title: Units of Measure
rowAttribute.description: The units in which the variable is to be measured, as a short text string. They must conform with the canonical units of the CF Standard Name. A link to a record describing the units in more detail is given be the unid attribute.

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Long name
rowAttribute.description: This value is used as the long_name variable attribute in the NetCDF files. It should conform to the data request style guide for titles.
rowAttribute.usage: A short phrase to be used in the long_name NetCDF variable attribute

rowAttribute.label: procnote
rowAttribute.title: Processing Notes
rowAttribute.description: Space separated list of keywords.

rowAttribute.label: procComment
rowAttribute.title: Processing Comments
rowAttribute.description: Free text comment about processing of the variable.

rowAttribute.label: prov
rowAttribute.title: Notes on Provenance of Variable Specifications
rowAttribute.description: Information on the provenance of the specification of this variables.

rowAttribute.label: provmip
rowAttribute.title: MIP Defining this Variable
rowAttribute.description: The MIP responsible for the original definition of this quantity

rowAttribute.label: unid
rowAttribute.title: Link to Units section
rowAttribute.description: Link to a unit description record.

table.label: mip
table.title: 1.1 Model Intercomparison Project
table.description: Model Intercomparison Project

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: description
rowAttribute.title: Description of the Model Intercomparison Project

rowAttribute.label: url
rowAttribute.title: Project Home Page
rowAttribute.description: Link to external site

table.label: varChoice
table.title: 3.10 Indicates variables for which a there is a range of potential CMOR Variables
table.description: There are several instances where variables defined in the tables are mutually exclusive options of which only one should be requested. The varChoice section is designed to hold this information, but is not yet complete. Examples are between ocean cell volume on a fixed grid for some models and monthly means for others, or between 6 hourly pressure level data on 8 levels vs. 4 levels for different objectives in the HighResMIP request. If the choiceClass in ConfigurationOptionSet the record should be linked to by one or more varChoiceLinkC records. If the choiceClass is RedundancySet the record should be linked to by one or more varChoiceLinkR records.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: choiceClass
rowAttribute.title: Class of choice: heirarchy|cfg
rowAttribute.description: Specifies which class of choice this is. 'ConfigurationOptionSet' (a set of variables for which the choice depends on some aspect of model configuration) or 'RedundancySet' (a set of variables which have some mutual redundancy, such as having overlapping sets of pressure levels).

rowAttribute.label: varList
rowAttribute.title: A colon separated list of variable names
rowAttribute.description: A list of the labels of the variables associated with this choice.

rowAttribute.label: optionList
rowAttribute.title: A list of options, one for each variable
rowAttribute.description: Redundant attribute: instructions are taken from rank attribute of varChoiceLinkR records.

table.label: temporalShape
table.title: 2.2 Temporal dimension
table.description: The temporal shape record contains the temporal dimensions.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: dimid
rowAttribute.title: Identifiers for record in grids section
rowAttribute.description: List of links to dimensions specified by records in the grids section.

rowAttribute.label: dimensions
rowAttribute.title: Dimensions
rowAttribute.description: List of the labels of dimension attributes (redundant with dimids).

table.label: structure
table.title: 2.3 Dimensions and related information
table.description: The structure record combines specification of dimensions, cell_measures and cell_methods attributes. Spatial and temporal dimensions are specified through links to 'spatialshape' and 'temporalshape' records.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: tmid
rowAttribute.title: Temporal Shape
rowAttribute.description: Link to a temporalShape record, defining the temporal dimensions.

rowAttribute.label: odims
rowAttribute.title: Other Dimensions
rowAttribute.description: Dimensions other than temporal and spatial dimensions (redundant with dids).

rowAttribute.label: dids
rowAttribute.title: Identifiers for records in grids section for dimensions
rowAttribute.description: List of links to the records defining dimensions other than spatial and temporal dimensions.

rowAttribute.label: coords
rowAttribute.title: Coordinates
rowAttribute.description: List of labels of coordinates. Redundant with cids.

rowAttribute.label: cids
rowAttribute.title: Identifiers for records in grids section for coordinates
rowAttribute.description: List of links to the records defining coordinates (dimensions referenced from the variable coordinates attribute).

rowAttribute.label: cell_methods
rowAttribute.title: Cell Methods
rowAttribute.description: Text for the NetCDF cell_methods attribute: describes processing used to generate the data values (redundant with cmid).

rowAttribute.label: cell_measures
rowAttribute.title: Cell Measures
rowAttribute.description: This can be either a string value for inclusion in the NetCDF variable attribute cell_measures, or a directive. In the latter case it will be a single word, --OPT or --MODEL. The first of these indicates that the data may be provided either on the cell centres or on the cell boundaries. --MODEL indicates that the data should be provided at the cell locations used for that variable in the model code (e.g. cell vertices).

rowAttribute.label: flag_values
rowAttribute.title: Flag Values
rowAttribute.description: If present, specifies values to be inlcuded in the 'flag_values' attribute.

rowAttribute.label: flag_meanings
rowAttribute.title: FLag Meanings
rowAttribute.description: If present, specifies values to be inlcuded in the 'flag_meanings' attribute.

rowAttribute.label: procNote
rowAttribute.title: Processing Note
rowAttribute.description: This is used to specify the category of structure. One of: areaType, areaTypeP, glsl, glslp, glslo, gm, h2mcm, misc, oneLevel, xyz, icesheet, xyzplus, zonaletc.

rowAttribute.label: prov
rowAttribute.title: Provenance
rowAttribute.description: Information about the origins of this record.

rowAttribute.label: cmid
rowAttribute.title: Link to Cell Methods Record
rowAttribute.description: Link to a cell methods record.

table.label: grids
table.title: 1.7 Specification of dimensions
table.description: Dimensions used by variables in the data request

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: tables
rowAttribute.title: CMOR table(s)
rowAttribute.description: List of tables which make use of this dimension

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: CMOR dimension
rowAttribute.description: Unique label

rowAttribute.label: altLabel
rowAttribute.title: output dimension name
rowAttribute.description: Name used for the dimension in NetCDF files

rowAttribute.label: standardName
rowAttribute.title: standard name
rowAttribute.description: Standard Name from the CF Conventions, used for the standard_name attribute of the axis variable.

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: long name
rowAttribute.description: Used for the variable long_name attribute

rowAttribute.label: axis
rowAttribute.title: axis
rowAttribute.description: For spatial or temporal dimensions, set to X, Y, Z or T.

rowAttribute.label: units
rowAttribute.title: units
rowAttribute.description: Units of measure used for the axis data variable.

rowAttribute.label: isIndex
rowAttribute.title: index axis?
rowAttribute.description: Set to 'OK' if the axis is an index axis with no coordinate values. Used, for example, for the generic vertical coordinates in the atmosphere, 'alev'.

rowAttribute.label: direction
rowAttribute.title: stored direction
rowAttribute.description: decreasing, increasing or empty

rowAttribute.label: type
rowAttribute.title: type
rowAttribute.description: Data type is specified using Fortran code words: character, double, integer, real

rowAttribute.label: value
rowAttribute.title: value of a scalar coordinate
rowAttribute.description: This attribute is only for scalar coordinates. Otherwise use *requested*

rowAttribute.label: tolRequested
rowAttribute.title: tol_on_requests: variance from requested values that is tolerated

table.label: timeSlice
table.title: 3.11 Time Slices for Output Requests
table.description: Time slices are used in some cases where some diagnostics required only for a subset of the years computed.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: type
rowAttribute.title: Type of time slice
rowAttribute.description: This is a string indicating how the year selection is described: 'simpleRange' is a single span of years indicated by a start and duration; 'yearList' is a collection of single years indicated by a start, number of years and a step; 'sliceList' is a list of multi-year time slices, indicated by a start year, a slice length, a total number of years (which must be an integer multiple of the slice length) and a step between slice starts; 'dayList' specifies a list of days as y/m/d triples; 'monthlyClimatology' implies 12 monthly values averaged over a specified range of years; 'relativeRange' specifies a range of years relative to the start of the simulation; 'branchedYears' specifies a list of years relative to a time in a branched experiment (can also be used for a climatology); 'siblingBranchClimatology' refers to a slice tied to years in another experiment branched from the same parent .. usually historical; 'monthlyClimatologyFinal' refers to a climatology over a final range of years (start and end should be blank).

rowAttribute.label: start
rowAttribute.title: Start year
rowAttribute.description: First year of the time slice. Blank if a startList is given.

rowAttribute.label: end
rowAttribute.title: End year
rowAttribute.description: Last year of the time slice. Blank if a startList is given.

rowAttribute.label: step
rowAttribute.title: Step (years)
rowAttribute.description: The step, in years, between different years in a 'yearList' or different start years in a 'sliceList' or 'sliceListExt'.

rowAttribute.label: sliceLen
rowAttribute.title: Length of slice
rowAttribute.description: Length of slice if less than the full range from start to end. Units specified by 'sliceLenUnit' if present, otherwise in years.

rowAttribute.label: nyears
rowAttribute.title: Total number of years
rowAttribute.description: Total number of years. Leave blank for dayList. For sliceList, the number of discrete slices is given by nyears divided by sliceLen. Otherwise, nyears should be equal to start minus end plus one.

rowAttribute.label: startList
rowAttribute.title: Optional list of start times.
rowAttribute.description: If type is 'dayList', then a list of (year,month,day) triples can be specified. E.g. '1850 1 1 1850 4 1' for first January and April 1850. If this value is given, start and end attributes should be empty.

rowAttribute.label: sliceLenUnit
rowAttribute.title: Units of slice length
rowAttribute.description: The units used to specify the slice length. Set to years if left blank.

rowAttribute.label: child
rowAttribute.title: Child experiment
rowAttribute.description: For type branchOffsetRange, the child attribute carries the name of the experiment which is branched. The time range is then specified in terms of the years in the child experiment.

table.description: Description of cell methods entries

rowAttribute.description: The string to be used in the NetCDF cell_methods attribute

rowAttribute.description: Keyword identifying the relationship (e.g. 'masking', 'vertical', 'time-mean')

annextable.title: 6.3 CMOR Variable Relation Links
annextable.description: Makes the link between CMOR Variable Relations and the variable records.

rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title

rowAttribute.description: Title of record
